remarks: A supremum belongs to its base class (closure law).  See also ~ supub and ~ suplub .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2004.)
statement:
supmo.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Or A ) $.
supcl.2 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. A ( A. y e. B -. x R y /\ A. y e. A ( y R x -> E. z e. B y R z ) ) ) $.
supcl $p |- ( ph -> sup ( B , A , R ) e. A ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
